text: Willem "Pim" Doesburg (; 28 October 1943 â€“ 17 November 2020) was a Dutch football goalkeeper. He made eight appearances for the Netherlands national football team from 1967 to 1981. He played a total of 687 matches in a 25-year career.Zestig jaar Eredivisie: Van der Kuylen, Doesburg en meer - Voetbal International Doesburg died on 17 November 2020 at the age of 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * VoetbalFocus Category:1943 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Footballers from Rotterdam
title: Pim Doesburg
